elements.text:
Your friend convinces you to go on a walk through a local park. You have heard that there are poisonous snakes in that park.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm excited to catch up with my friend.
I'm so worried about whether I will see a snake.
I'm anxious thinking about a snake biting me, but know that I'll be OK on this walk.
I'm scared to go into the park, but then realize I've never heard of someone getting bitten in that park.
I'm eager to tell my friend about what happened at work today.
